caption.p: In vitro anti-elastase activity of Plectranthus spp. (A) Organic extracts at 100 g/mL. (B) Aqueous extracts at 100 g/mL. (C) Isolated compounds at 100 g/mL. The results are presented as means percentage values, considering the absorbance of ursolic acid as the positive control. Data are expressed as the mean ± SD ( n = 3) *** p < 0.0001 vs negative control (DMSO 1% (v/v) in Tris-HCl buffer). DMSO: dimethyl sulphoxide; HCl: Hydrochloride; ns: not significant; SD: Standard Deviation; Tris: tris(hydroxymethyl) aminomethane. Values were determined by one-way ANOVA followed by Tukey HSD comparison test.
